title.narrative: Nigeria Child Eye Health Project

description.narrative: Individuals in the community have access to good quality eye care services for the commonest causes of blindness and vision impairment, at a cost that is affordable to the population. NB. Previously, the Northwest Nigeria Child Health Initiative was coded 44038. From 2020 onwards, this project was re-coded as 44044 and a new project site created - outputs and information for the Nigeria Child Health Initiative can now be found there.
